metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20673 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The demangle_template function in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31.1, contains an integer overflow vulnerability (for "Create an array for saving the template argument values") that can trigger a heap-based buffer overflow, as demonstrated by nm.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code was removed in 2.32, see bug for more info ccdm94> provided patch removes functionality for versions before 2.32. See gcc bug for more information.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'intrusive fix').
